org.elasticsearch.index.translog

Class ImmutableTranslogReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.translog.TranslogReader
      • org.elasticsearch.index.translog.ImmutableTranslogReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Comparable<TranslogReader>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LegacyTranslogReader

    public class ImmutableTranslogReader
extends TranslogReader
    a translog reader which is fixed in length

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImmutableTranslogReader

        public ImmutableTranslogReader(long generation,
                               org.elasticsearch.index.translog.ChannelReference channelReference,
                               long firstOperationOffset,
                               long length,
                               int totalOperations)
        Create a snapshot of translog file channel. The length parameter should be consistent with totalOperations and point at the end of the last operation in this snapshot.
